verses.text: O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, rebuke me not in thine anger, neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.+ 6.1 chief…: or, overseer*+ 6.1 Sheminith: or, the eighth*
Have mercy upon me, O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**; for I am* weak: O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, heal me; for my bones are vexed.
My soul is also sore vexed: but thou, O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, how long?
Return, O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, deliver my soul: oh save me for thy mercies’ sake.
For in death there is* no remembrance of thee: in the grave who shall give thee thanks?
I am weary with my groaning; all the night make I my bed to swim; I water my couch with my tears.+ 6.6 all…: or, every night*
Mine eye is consumed because of grief; it waxeth old because of all mine enemies.
Depart from me, all ye workers of iniquity; for the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** hath heard the voice of my weeping.
The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** hath heard my supplication; the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** will receive my prayer.
Let all mine enemies be ashamed and sore vexed: let them return and* be ashamed suddenly.
